meaningMnemonic: When someone is <radical>sick</radical> in order to diagnose the <radical>correct</radical> cause and treatment, you need to check their <kanji>symptom</kanji>s. You have to be especially careful too, because if you get a symptom wrong, you could kill them!
readingMnemonic: You need to figure out the <kanji>symptom</kanji>s the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) is having. This is really serious too, so you better be correct about which sickness he has. If something bad happens to the Shougun it will be off with your head.
